scenario.title: User authorization
scenario.step: When site is opened, title is Electronics, Cars, Fashion, Collectibles, Coupons and More | eBay
And enter login atest.test1@mail.ru and password a12345678
Then user cabinet is opened, title is Мой eBay Краткий обзорorg.junit.ComparisonFailure: expected:<Мой eBay[ ]Краткий обзор> but was:<Мой eBay[ ]Краткий обзор>
